channel.title: Text on Interface 508
channel.description:
Hello. I require help for inputting certain text "effects" on an Interface. Such as and so on, I was wanting to know the code for making a line appear over your text. Example:
This is a sample text.
would cross out that text on interface. I need a code like that.

item.title: Text on Interface 508
item.dc:creator: @Owned_Pl0xs Owned_Pl0xs
item.description:
@Owned_Pl0xs wrote:

Here are all the chat engine effects I know you can use for 508s.

“this is strikeout text”
“<trans=100>this is transparent text”
“<shad=1>this is shaded text”

Read full topic

item.title: Text on Interface 508
item.dc:creator: @Lord_of_fallen_Angel Lord of fallen Angels
item.description:
@Lord_of_fallen_Angel wrote:

Hello. I require help for inputting certain text “effects” on an Interface.

Such as <col=######> and so on, I was wanting to know the code for making a line appear over your text.
Example:
This is a sample text. would cross out that text on interface. I need a code like that.

Read full topic
